data.description: CVS like update front end for Perforce
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This sits upon the existing P4 modules to provide higher level p4
    functions (like "is a file the same" and is there a .cvsignore?). It
    also includes a script that uses the package to let p4 users have a
    cvs-like look and feel.

    The name c4 is based upon a older C based program "c4" and is a
    corruption between the names "p4" and "cvs".
